mapper.select: SELECT B.*, P.*, A.* , NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKELIST WHERE B.BNO = BNO GROUP BY B.BNO), 0) AS BLIKE FROM PRODUCT P , BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.BNO = B.BNO) WHERE LCNO = 1 AND PSTOCK > 0 AND BTNO = 2 AND B.BSTATUS = 'Y' AND P.BNO = B.BNO ORDER BY B.BNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BTNO = 2 AND BSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.*, P.*, C.COMNAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE BNO = B.BNO AND CSTATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW = 'N') AS COMMENTCOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT USERID FROM LIKELIST WHERE BNO = #{ bNo })) AS BLIKE FROM BOARD B, PRODUCT P, COMPANY C WHERE (B.BNO = P.BNO) AND B.BNO = #{ bNo } AND P.COMNO = C.COMNO
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BNO = #{ bNo } ORDER BY ANO
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BNO = #{ bNo } ORDER BY ANO

SELECT A.* , (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = A.USERID) AS WRITER , TO_CHAR(CDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:mi') AS DATE2CHAR FROM BOARDCOMMENT A WHERE A.BNO = #{ bNo } AND A.CSTATUS = 'Y' AND A.REVIEW = 'N' ORDER BY CDATE, BCNO
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE BNO = #{ bNo } AND BSTATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDCOMMENT VALUES(SEQ_BCNO.NEXTVAL, #{BNO}, #{CCONTENTS}, #{USERID}, SYSDATE, 'Y', 'N', 0, DEFAULT)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARDCOMMENT WHERE BCNO = #{ bcNo }
